pages.text: Everyone knows the pain of smashing one's head into a wall or feet into the ground at terminal velocity. Conveniently, the $(item)Shock Absorber$() exists to lessen the impact. Being a stylish pair of shoes made mostly of $(item)Phantom Membrane$() and $(item)Wool$(), held together by some $(l:things:items/gleaming_materials)Gleaming Compound$(), it is capable of $(thing)reducing both fall and kinetic damage by 75%$().
